description: Java service class implementing business logic for managing notes, including CRUD operations, validation, and logging.

classes.name: NoteService
classes.description: Service layer for handling business logic related to Note entities.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Returns a paginated list of all notes.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Fetches a single note by its UUID, throws NotFoundException if not found.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new note from provided data transfer object.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing note identified by UUID with new data.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a note identified by UUID.

methods.name: validateTitle
methods.description: Validates that the title is non-blank and within character limit.

methods.name: trimToNull
methods.description: Trims input string and returns null if empty.
